items.text: Earthquakes can be like nature's rollercoaster, shaking things up from gentle wiggles to wild rides that toss objects into the air!
Some places are like earthquake party zones, having quakes all the time, while others might go years without a single shake!
Did you know that one time, a huge earthquake rumbled through Afghanistan, shaking the ground from a depth of 130 miles? That's like shaking a soda bottle from way down below!
